name: Vishal Chaurasia
title: Founder & Lead Instructor
bio: IIT Patna graduate with a background in top PSU. Transitioned to focus on disseminating ancient Indian knowledge and has a significant online presence through the Hyper Quest channel.

name: Dr. Rajesh Kumar
title: Sanskrit Scholar & Course Instructor
bio: PhD in Sanskrit Literature with 12+ years of experience in Gurukul tradition. Gold medalist in MA Sanskrit and nationally awarded for his contributions to Sanskrit education.

name: Acharya Jamwant Ji
title: Master of Sānkhya Philosophy
bio: Traditional scholar with 10+ years of teaching experience, specializing in Sānkhya philosophy and emotional intelligence. Author of 2 books and mentor to 500+ disciples.

name: Dr. Priya Sharma
title: Vedanta Philosophy Expert
bio: Renowned scholar of Vedanta philosophy with 15+ years of experience. Helps students understand the profound wisdom of ancient Indian thought and its practical applications.

name: Meera Patel
title: Sanskrit Grammar Expert
bio: With over 15 years of experience in Sanskrit grammar and literature, Meera brings deep knowledge and patient teaching to help students master the fundamentals.
